text: Oleksii Prokhorenko (; 6 March 1985, Kyiv, Ukraine) is a Ukrainian entrepreneur and business strategist. Founder & CEO of GT Invest. Member of the board at Ukrprompostach. == Biography == Oleksii Prokhorenko was born in Kyiv, Ukraine. === Education === In 2002â€”2006, he studied at the National State Tax Service University of Ukraine as a lawyer for a bachelor's degree. In 2007, Oleksii Prokhorenko entered the Kyiv National University of Trade and Economics at the Faculty of Economic Law for a master's degree. In 2009 he graduated from the university. In 2014, Prokhorenko graduated from the G.S. Kostiuk Institute of Psychology of the National Academy of Pedagogical Sciences of Ukraine as a Doctor of Psychology. === Career === In February 2011 Oleksii Prokhorenko became the CEO of the Ukrprompostach. Since February 2012, he is the managing director of the company. Since February 2020, he is the founder and CEO of the GT Invest Ukraine. This is a company that deals with the solution of investment projects in Ukraine. == Publications == *Sausages and artificial intelligence: how Ukrprompostach builds its trading network / Ukrainian Retail Association / September 2019 *New technologies are changing all areas of the business / GigaTrans News / March 2019 == Related pages == * Sergei Levteev * Oleksiy Skrypnyk == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Ukrainian businesspeople
title: Oleksii Prokhorenko
